2.caption_en:
A teal rounded rectangular callout urging teams to define their future offerings within the ecosystem and to identify the capabilities and moves required to support them.

{
  "artifact_type": "text_callout",
  "shape": "rounded_rectangle",
  "background_color": "teal/cyan",
  "border": {
    "color": "darker_teal",
    "width": "thin"
  },
  "text_color": "white",
  "text_alignment": "left",
  "text": "Define your future offerings in the ecosystem and understand required capabilities / moves",
  "text_lines": [
    "Define your future offerings in",
    "the ecosystem and understand",
    "required capabilities / moves"
  ],
  "language": "en",
  "purpose": "strategic instruction",
  "image_dimensions": {
    "width_px": 658,
    "height_px": 197
  },
  "notes": "Left-aligned white text on a teal rounded rectangle with a thin darker border."
}

3.caption_en:
A horizontal 5-stage roadmap titled "Ecosystem Strategy Process" that outlines an 8-week (visual shows four 2-week sprints plus a 1-week close) program across WHY–WHAT–HOW columns: Needs, Vision, Offerings, Ventures, and Initiate, with specific activities for each stage, management-alignment checkpoints, and a final presentation.

{
  "title": "Ecosystem Strategy Process",
  "subtitle": "In 8 weeks towards a proper strategy to draw the right decisions",
  "total_duration_weeks_displayed": 8,
  "timeline_breakdown_weeks": [
    { "stage_id": 1, "name": "Needs", "duration_weeks": 2 },
    { "stage_id": 2, "name": "Vision", "duration_weeks": 2 },
    { "stage_id": 3, "name": "Offerings", "duration_weeks": 2 },
    { "stage_id": 4, "name": "Ventures", "duration_weeks": 2 },
    { "stage_id": 5, "name": "Initiate", "duration_weeks": 1 }
  ],
  "columns": ["WHY", "WHAT", "HOW"],
  "stages": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Needs",
      "column": "WHY",
      "activities": [
        "Scoping of the future ecosystem – user journey",
        "Understand consumer & key stakeholder needs",
        "Understand key market trends & forces",
        "Understand Market Competition"
      ],
      "outcome_summary": "Deepen understanding of future user needs and market transformations"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Vision",
      "column": "WHAT",
      "activities": [
        "Locate value pools & innovation whitespaces",
        "Locate critical control points",
        "Define an integrated ecosystem vision",
        "Evaluate & select strategic ecosystem moves"
      ],
      "outcome_summary": "Define an aligned vision of the future ecosystem and strategic plays"
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "name": "Offerings",
      "column": "WHAT",
      "activities": [
        "Create an integrated ecosystem offering portfolio",
        "Define required capabilities",
        "Understand existing assets & capabilities",
        "Define a 3 horizon roadmap"
      ],
      "outcome_summary": "Define your future offerings in the ecosystem and required capabilities/moves"
    },
    {
      "id": 4,
      "name": "Ventures",
      "column": "HOW",
      "activities": [
        "Define Portfolio of Projects incl. platform plays",
        "Define platform business model(s)",
        "Evaluate & prioritize projects (Buy, build, partner, join)",
        "Create an integrated roadmap"
      ],
      "outcome_summary": "Define & select platform opportunities to accelerate transition from as-is to future positioning"
    },
    {
      "id": 5,
      "name": "Initiate",
      "column": "HOW",
      "activities": [
        "Initiate Supervisory Board",
        "Communicate Vision",
        "Initiate first Projects",
        "Source required resources"
      ],
      "outcome_summary": "Initiate first projects and implement right operating model"
    }
  ],
  "milestones": [
    { "type": "Mgmt Alignment", "position": "after stage 1" },
    { "type": "Mgmt Alignment", "position": "after stage 2" },
    { "type": "Mgmt Alignment", "position": "after stage 3" },
    { "type": "Mgmt Alignment", "position": "after stage 4" },
    { "type": "Final Presentation", "position": "end" }
  ],
  "visual_notes": {
    "layout": "horizontal roadmap with numbered chevrons for stages",
    "color_highlights": ["teal/cyan for stage headers", "gray for detail boxes", "orange for final presentation diamond"]
  }
}
